titles.title: Limiting Lead Exposure & Advancing Detection in Children's Foods Act
Limiting Lead Exposure & Advancing Detection in Children’s Foods Act
Limiting LEAD in Children's Foods Act
Limiting LEAD in Children’s Foods Act
A bill to require updated limits on levels of lead in fruit juice beverages and an updated tolerable daily level of lead exposure from foods, and for other purposes.
Limiting LEAD in Children's Foods Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
